title: Monitor Player Health Data
description: A team's sports scientist needs to analyze GPS and heart rate data from a training session to identify players at risk of overexertion.

tasks.description: Ingest the GPS and heart rate data from the players' wearable devices after a training session.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully loads the data for all players.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to calculate each player's total distance covered, high-speed running distance, and time spent in high heart rate zones.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a performance summary for each player.

tasks.description: Flag any players whose training load is significantly higher than their weekly average.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies two players who are at high risk of fatigue.

tasks.description: Send a report to the head coach recommending a lighter training day for the flagged players.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends a report with actionable recommendations.
